search: Search for notes, categories or labels

registration.name: First name
registration.choose_biometrics: Would you like to use fingerprint or FaceId to sign in?

errors.no_user: There's no such email. Would you like to sign up?

questions.how_change_date: How change the date of the report?

answers.how_add_trans: You can add transaction by pressing the button "Add new" on Home page, after that choose type of transaction, it`s amount and description
answers.how_add_cat: You edit or add expense categories in "Manage categories" menu. Go to "Settings" > "Manage categories". App allows you to edit category`s icon, title, and even order
answers.how_edit_trans: If you made a mistake creating a note about transaction you can simply delete it and create a new one! To do this,long press on a transaction item on Home page, and then press "Delete" button in context menu
answers.how_del_trans: To do this,long press on a transaction item on Home page, and then press "Delete" button in context menu
answers.how_stats_work: It creates a report of all monthly transactions. You also can download it in PDF
answers.how_balance_work: It takes all the transactions you`ve added from the beginning to the month you`ve chosen
answers.how_change_date: You can choose the date by pressing "<" or ">" buttons to navigate back and forward, also by pressing the date you can choose month in context menu.
